when there is a failure to succession by: Section 68 of the  Land Development Ordinance which refers to failure of succession reads thus,

column2: The  spouse  of a  deceased  permit-holder,  who  at  the  time  of his  or  her  death  was  paying  an
annual  sum  by  virtue  of the  provisions  of subsection  (3)  of section  19A,  or  the  spouse  of an
owner, fails to succeed to  the land held by such permit-holder on the permit or to  the holding of
such owner, as the case may be,
If such spouse refuses to  succeed to  that land or holding, or
